author: Ubisoft
description:
Nobushi is free for a limited time, and on sale as well! We're also releasing a Unique Execution for that Hero.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, Th
title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - September 4

author: Ubisoft
description:
Make them beg for forgiveness. Y9S3: Downfall starts September 11th, 2025. 

Lady Saori Hero Skin for Nobushi is available September 11, 2025.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. title: For Honor: Year 9 Season 3 - Downfall Gameplay Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
Star Wars Outlaws is out now on Nintendo Switch 2!

Experience the ultimate galactic adventure with Star Wars Outlaws on Nintendo Switch 2! Whether at home or on the go, enjoy intuitive touch controls for menu navigation and select minigames, an optimized handheld mode, and immersive motion controls for key features.

About Star Wars Outlaws:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars™ game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

#Ubisoft #StarWarsOutlaws

author: Ubisoft
description:
⚔️ Swap characters on the fly, just like switching weapons in an FPS
🎯 Unleash devastating combos and slaughter your enemies
🌌 Survive a brutal yet stunning world filled with rich lore
